title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama-2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally on macOS and Linux with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API; install via `pip install ollama`.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; install via `npm install ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (`pip install langchain-ollama`) exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs & embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that connects to local Ollama instances; supports chat, file upload, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with readline, history, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Experimental fork replacing GitHub Copilot backend with a local Ollama model inside Vim/Neovim.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-codellama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that pipes editor selection to CodeLlama running in Ollama for inline explanation or generation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Go gRPC server that proxies Ollama REST API for high-performance micro-service deployments.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama and pre-built model derivations to nixpkgs; merged into unstable.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library (NuGet OllamaSharp) with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord.py bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfile recipes and quantization notes for running exotic models in Ollama.
